name: CBRN Threat Assessment Unit
description: This specialized team focuses on analyzing and predicting potential chemical, biological, radiological, and nuclear threats. They provide critical intelligence to inform strategic decision-making and resource allocation.

name: Decontamination Systems Development
description: This department is dedicated to creating cutting-edge decontamination technologies and protocols. Their work ensures rapid and effective cleanup of CBRN agents, minimizing long-term environmental and health impacts.

name: CBRN Sensor Technology Innovation
description: This group spearheads the development of advanced detection and identification systems for CBRN agents. Their innovations are crucial for early warning and rapid response capabilities.

name: Protective Equipment Engineering
description: This team designs and improves personal protective equipment (PPE) specifically for CBRN scenarios. Their work directly impacts the safety and effectiveness of first responders and military personnel in contaminated environments.

name: CBRN Training Simulation
description: This department creates immersive, realistic training scenarios using advanced simulation technologies. They ensure that personnel are well-prepared for the unique challenges of CBRN incidents.

name: CBRN Medical Countermeasures Research
description: This specialized research unit focuses on developing medical treatments and prophylactics for CBRN exposures. Their work is critical for mitigating the health impacts of CBRN incidents.

name: CBRN Forensics and Attribution
description: This team develops methods and technologies for identifying the origin of CBRN agents used in attacks. Their work is essential for deterrence and international accountability.

name: CBRN Environmental Remediation
description: This department specializes in long-term cleanup and restoration of areas affected by CBRN incidents. They develop strategies to minimize ecological damage and restore habitability.

name: CBRN Policy and Compliance
description: This unit ensures that all CBRN defense activities comply with international treaties and regulations. They also work on shaping future policies related to CBRN threats and responses.

name: CBRN Incident Command Systems
description: This team develops specialized command and control systems for managing CBRN incidents. Their work ensures effective coordination and communication during complex, multi-agency responses.

name: CBRN Public Communication Strategies
description: This department focuses on developing effective communication plans for CBRN incidents. They work to ensure accurate, timely information dissemination to minimize panic and misinformation during crises.

name: CBRN Supply Chain Security
description: This unit works on securing the supply chain for CBRN defense equipment and materials. They develop strategies to prevent the diversion of dual-use technologies and ensure the integrity of critical supplies.
